title: A Mind Apart: Travels in a Neurodiverse World
description: An intimate exploration of mental disease draws on the author's manic depression experience and interviews with people who suffer from such conditions as multiple personality disorder, autism, and schizophrenia, evaluating what can be learned by the alternate perceptions inherent with each disease. By the author of Body Toxic. 20,000 first printing.
author: Susanne Paola Antonetta
